Induce1: Perfect task management you won't forget. Improved concentration to achieve goals. Efficient life through time management. And just free!
Induce3: Add to your home screen now for instant access when you need it!
Induce4: You can add this to your home screen from any device, including iOS and Android.
EasyMemoDescriptionGuide: Can easily memo your tasks with a few clicks.
NotificationDescriptionDescription: Can set notifications so you don't miss important tasks.
TagDescriptionGuide: Can set tags to easily classify and manage tasks.
DateDescriptionGuide: Can register tasks by date for planned management.
ThemeDescriptionGuide: Choose between Light Mode and Dark Mode according to your preference.
AnalisysDescriptionGuide: Provides statistics by simply analyzing your tasks.
OfflineDescriptionGuide: Stay on top of your tasks, even while offline, with memoku.
ImageLimit: Up to 5 photos can be selected.
PageLDDescription: MEMOKU is a task management web app that helps you manage tasks easily with features like easy memo, notifications, tags, date management, dark mode, task analysis, and offline mode.
PageLDAboutDescription: Manage tasks, set reminders, and organize your life with MEMOKU.
PageLDFeatureDescription1: Can easily memo your tasks with a few clicks.
PageLDFeatureDescription2: Can set notifications so you don't miss important tasks.
PageLDFeatureName3: Can set tags to easily classify and manage tasks.
PageLDFeatureDescription3: Can set tags to easily classify and manage tasks.
PageLDFeatureDescription4: Can register tasks by date for planned management.
PageLDFeatureDescription5: Choose between Light Mode and Dark Mode according to your preference.
PageLDFeatureDescription6: Provides statistics by simply analyzing your tasks.
PageLDFeatureDescription7: Catch up on your tasks even when you're offline with our app.
PageTitle: A free, offline-capable, sleek note web app for simple note-taking.
PageDescription: Memoku is a memo web app designed for efficient task management. It features a simple UI and dark mode for an enhanced user experience. Key functionalities include task creation, tag-based task management, push notifications, offline usage, date-based task organization, and task analysis. With Memoku, you can systematically manage your tasks anytime, anywhere, and ensure you never miss important deadlines.
PageKeywords: web, simple, todo, todolist, reminder, remind, memo, app, application, nuxt3, pwa, offline, free, online
AppCloseGuide: Press the back button once more to exit.
News_PWA_Title: Add MEMOKU to your home screen for easy app-like access.
News_PWA_Desc: MEMOKU is a Progressive Web App (PWA) that can be added to your home screen, allowing you to use it like a native app and enhancing your user experience.
Post_pwa_title: Add to Home Screen and Use MEMOKU Like an App
Post_pwa_desc: As a Progressive Web App (PWA), MEMOKU can be added to your home screen, making it easy to launch like an app, receive notifications, and improve your user experience.
Post_pwa_add_chrome_desc1: 1. Click the download icon (Install MEMOKU App) at the top of your browser.
Post_pwa_add_chrome_desc2: 2. Click the install button in the popup window.
Post_pwa_add_android_desc1: 1. Open MEMOKU in the Chrome browser and tap the more options icon.
Post_pwa_add_android_desc2: 2. Tap the 'Add to Home Screen' button.
Post_pwa_add_iphone_desc1: 1. Open MEMOKU in the Safari browser and tap the more options button.
Post_pwa_add_iphone_desc2: 2. Tap the 'Add to Home Screen' button.
Post_pwa_end_desc:
MEMOKU is lightweight and
does not affect other systems.

The MEMOKU team is committed to
protecting your personal information.
